cab.content: SECRET.Operations.From: G.O..C.-in-C ,, G.H..Q. Salonika. To: C.I.G.S., War Office...Handed in 9.10 p.m. 6.1a18* Received 200 aem, 7,1,, 18cG.C 197.According-to information received: owing to serious disaffection amongst the Russians serving in this force they are being withdrawn from the front line and their place is being taken by 175th and 176th regiments of the 156th French Division. In case of trouble, additional French troops are being moved from reserve to the Korica Fiorina area. The relief is reported to be an awkward (? one) to carry out as the lines between the lakes are very close, and between the Russians and the German -delegates, who are with the Bulgarians, there has. been much frat erni z at i on.
